scripts.build:all: npm run build:programs && npm run generate:clients
scripts.install:clients: npm install --prefix programs/axelar-solana-gateway-v2/clients/js && npm install --prefix programs/axelar-solana-gas-service-v2/clients/js && npm install --prefix programs/axelar-solana-governance-v2/clients/js && npm install --prefix programs/axelar-solana-memo-v2/clients/js
scripts.build:clients: npm run build --prefix programs/axelar-solana-gateway-v2/clients/js && npm run build --prefix programs/axelar-solana-gas-service-v2/clients/js && npm run build --prefix programs/axelar-solana-governance-v2/clients/js && npm run build --prefix programs/axelar-solana-memo-v2/clients/js
